rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MKB146, MKF3301%, MKT3301, MKW3301, MKX3301}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB1200, MKF1120, MKP1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 (On-campus split block of classes)

description: An in-depth analysis of the marketing techniques that apply to service organisations and industries including service design and delivery, customer service, service quality measurement and internal marketing.
